main event: A round object, estimated to be the size of a large pencil, was observed by witnesses 25 miles west of Denver, Colorado in Bergen Park on December 31, 1955.
interesting points: The object was silvery in color, similar to an aircraft.
The object was initially seen slowly, but then appeared to gain speed, estimated to be around 1,000 mph.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 40,000 feet.
The observers' attention was first attracted by a jet aircraft in the area.
The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute.
location: 25 miles west of Denver, Colorado, Bergen Park
